example_en: We set up our tent at a beautiful campsite near the lake.
example_cn: 我们在湖边一个美丽的野营地搭起了帐篷。
word_family: camp (n. 营地), camping (n. 露营), camper (n. 露营者)
memory_tips: 词根 'camp' 来自拉丁语 'campus'，意为'田野'或'营地'。后缀 '-site' 表示'地点'。联想记忆：想象一个帐篷和篝火的场景，帮助记住 'campsite' 是露营的地方。

image_prompt.main_image: A scenic view of a campsite with tents pitched on a grassy area near a calm lake, surrounded by tall trees and mountains in the background. A campfire is burning in the foreground.
image_prompt.example_image: A group of friends sitting around a campfire at a campsite, with tents visible in the background and a starry night sky above.
